results.name: Initial digits of squares.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Gelfand's Question
mathematica: a[n_] := First[IntegerDigits[n^2]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100} (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 21 2008 *)
